original_text: They helped David against raiding bands, for all of them were brave warriors, and they were commanders in his army.
korean_text: 이 무리가 다윗을 도와 도둑 떼를 쳤으니 그들은 다 큰 용사요 군대 지휘관이 됨이었더라

sentences.original_text: They helped David against raiding bands
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다윗을 도와 약탈하는 무리들과 싸웠습니다

sentences.original_text: for all of them were brave warriors
and they were commanders in his army
